name: Campfire Magic
description: Can only be cast in a safe place.

name: Exhausting
description: You cannot use magic for 1 round after casting.

name: Costs 1 Attrition
description: You lose 1 skill each time this spell is cast.

name: Druidic
description: Fails if wearing or touching metal.

name: Madness
description: On failure, gain the Crazy flaw until you rest.

name: Painful
description: After casting, you can only move your next turn.

name: Takes 2 Phases
description: Spell triggers only after 2 full phases.

name: Unstable
description: On failure, roll Unstable Magic table.

name: Infernal
description: On failure, roll Infernal Magic table.
